description: For a limited group of individuals, we will open out a treasure trove hidden in Bangalore! You will get to experience the restoration, preservation & collection of Historic Cars, Motorcycles, Carriages and all things automotive passionately built over the past 40 years!

name: In the footsteps of the Tiger of Mysore.
description: Discover the history of Bangalore fort, its tales of glory & treachery over the past five centuries with us.The walk begins with a vegetarian breakfast. After that we take our guests to explore the remnants of Tipu's summer palace, the Bangalore fort & the armory.During the course of the walk learn how Anglo-French wars in Europe & North America had their impact in Southern India too.The guests get to learn more about Tipu's weapons on mass destruction of the 18th century & how they influenced the US national anthem & how one small Southern Indian kingdom was a thorn in the East India Company's rule.

name: Malleswara Darshan heritage walk.
description: This is our walk in one of the oldest suburbs of the "old Bangalore". Join us on a 'darshan' of the many temples and other religious institutes that dot this area as we narrate to you its origins and about the celebrities/personalities who called it their 'home'. Also on this walk learn more about the Maratha connection to this neighborhood as well as how a philanthropist not only helped renovate the Kadu Malleswara temple but also helped create an entire lake in the days gone by.See how Kadu Malleswara turned into a "Mall-e-swarm" and is fast losing not only it's heritage structures but also its local culture. In between all the bytes of history we take bites from an iconic eatery in the this area.So join us on this walk next and get to know Malleswaram in a completely new light.

name: Magic: The Gathering with ReRoll Board Games
description: After many years of talking about this, we’re finally starting a Magic: The Gathering meetup. If you are curious about this massively popular card game, or are already a player looking to find others to play with in-person, this is for you!For people who’ve never played before:This is designed for new players to explore the game. We’ll teach you the rules, and will pair up new players with each other. We’ll be playing the with 40-card decks, using the Jumpstart 2022 set - which is a great way to learn the game without too much time on deck building.For experienced playersWe have a few premade standard (60 card) decks to play, as well a few commander decks.This is a light, friendly environment for players to explore the game and meet the community - it is not a competitive event. Be helpful, and expect people to make mistakes.

name: Kavitayon Ki Dastak
description: Dialogues Cafe brings to you a Sunday full of kavitā and shāyari!If you love writing or just listening to Hindi poetry or couplets of shāyari or lyrical ghazals — we invite you to a poetic sundowner filled with hindi writing and sher-shāyari. Let`s get together for `Kavitāyon Ki Dastak`, an open mic — or rather an open mehfil — to set your mood and make you feel wholesome."utth ke mehfil se mat chale jānātum se raushan ye konā konā hai"Be a part of this community, share the love and lehzā with your words. Come join us to have agood time reciting, listening and absorbing the creativity of Hindi artists and shāyars. Wrap up your week with mellow vibes and be rejuvenated to start the next week afresh!Venue: Dialogues Café, KoramangalaEvery Second Sunday of the MonthTime: 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm

name: Dialogues with Books
description: Dialogues with Books Join us for our book club meetup every third Sunday of the month. Bring along your favorite book, the book you are currently reading, or any book that had an impact on you. Share your experience reading the book with fellow bibliophiles and participate in winding and fun discussions around the joy of reading. Do all this while sipping on coffee/tea or having a hot tasty snack from our cafe! Your Host - Bharat is an avid reader with a penchant for classical literature and philosophy. He also dabbles in writing with a diverse portfolio of works across tech, philosophy, magical realism and fantasy. His reading diet includes a mix of fiction and non-fiction with his favorite novels being The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Movable feast by Hemmingway and Crime and Punishment by Dostoevsky.Note: Rs.100 as cover is part of the ticket price.

name: Ek Shaam Poetry Ke Naam
description: Ek Shaam Poetry Ke Naam - A room. Some beanbags and cushions. Souls lost in Hindi poetry and Urdu verse. Open the doors, and enter the world of Bachchan, Dinkar, Akhtar, Ghalib, Sahir, and others.With Ek Shaam Poetry Ke Naam, we bring to you an evening of hour-long recital of poetry written by masters of Hindi and Urdu. Interspersed in these recitals are stories of their life, translations of their works and a discovery of the nuances in their written word. Once in a while, you might find a surprise - a little something out of the box designed for the lover of poetry.Come join us - the mehfil awaits. (Please note: This is NOT an Open Mic)—-Abhilash is an entrepreneur, a corporate educator, and a storyteller. He has spent much of his life reading, memorising and reciting poems of great Hindi/Urdu poets. For years, he has shared this love for poetry with close friends, colleagues and family.Radha is a story-teller, chemistry researcher, traveller, writer, mythology buff, mother, product builder, and bathroom singer - in no particular order. She grew up surrounded by the works of some of our best poets, with her mother reciting Bachchan and Dinkar and her father playing ghazals on the old tape recorder. What started as their separate childhood passions, now finds a collective expression in Ek Shaam Poetry Ke Naam

description: Step into Legacy Leaves: Pursuing Independent Directorship, a transformative workshop that guides aspiring and experienced leaders in navigating the path to impactful boardroom roles. name: Smash Guys Burger Residency with Beer
description: Smash Guys Burger Residency with BeerThe Smash Guys Burger Residency with Beer marks a thrilling new chapter for The Conservatory, a space that has become a hotspot for culinary innovation over the past two years. We've hosted some of the country’s most exciting chefs and restaurants, recently venturing into international collaborations that have elevated Bengaluru’s dining scene.Now, we’re taking it one step further by introducing a unique residency experience—and who better to kick it off than the Smash Guys? With their expertly crafted burgers and a mission to redefine the city’s burger game, this month-long residency promises to be a delicious adventure you won’t want to miss.Smash Guys is the latest creation from Nikhil and AB Gupta, the culinary masterminds behind The Pizza Bakery and Paris Panini. This time, their mission is bold: to celebrate the art of the burger by bringing the finest styles from across the globe under one roof.After months of meticulously crafting every bite since their smash hit debut at The Conservatory, they’re now ready to take things up a notch with an exciting month-long residency.Smash Guys is here to redefine Bengaluru’s burger scene, filling the flavor void with juicy patties, crisp buns, and creative combinations that promise to thrill every burger lover in town.The dream team behind Smash Guys: Chef Guru is the Chef Partner at The Pizza Bakery & Paris Panini. Graduated from Le Cordon Bleu, Australia, his expertise in balancing textures and creating unique sauce combinations brings an unexpected twist to classic burger elements. His commitment to sourcing premium ingredients ensures every component tells its own story while contributing to a harmonious whole.Chef Adithya Kidambi is our friendly neighborhood kombucha scientist. He has built mossant into the best craft kombucha brand in the city, but what few know about him is that he is a trained Chef and self-taught burger scholar who delivered burgers to people during the lockdown post which he sold out at several pop-ups in the city. Adi excels in styles like the Nashville Chicken, Smash Buff/Lamb classics, and Asian-inspired burgers using ingredients like kimchi and miso.Chef Suby is all about chasing the ULTIMATE BURGER DREAM. His obsession with achieving the perfect meat-to-fat ratio and that caramelised crust has led him to experiment with countless grinds and smashing techniques. Chef Rohil brings an elegant touch to the veg side of our menu. With their expertly crafted burgers and a mission to redefine the city’s burger game, this month-long residency promises to be a delicious adventure you won’t want to miss.Smash Guys is the latest creation from Nikhil and AB Gupta, the culinary masterminds behind The Pizza Bakery and Paris Panini. Graduated from Le Cordon Bleu, Australia, his expertise in balancing textures and creating unique sauce combinations brings an unexpected twist to classic burger elements. His commitment to sourcing premium ingredients ensures every component tells its own story while contributing to a harmonious whole.Chef Adithya Kidambi is our friendly neighborhood kombucha scientist. His obsession with achieving the perfect meat-to-fat ratio and that caramelised crust has led him to experiment with countless grinds and smashing techniques. Chef Rohil brings an elegant touch to the veg side of our menu. description: Smash Guys Burger Residency with BeerThe Smash Guys Burger Residency with Beer marks a thrilling new chapter for The Conservatory, a space that has become a hotspot for culinary innovation over the past two years. We've hosted some of the country’s most exciting chefs and restaurants, recently venturing into international collaborations that have elevated Bengaluru’s dining scene.Now, we’re taking it one step further by introducing a unique residency experience—and who better to kick it off than the Smash Guys? With their expertly crafted burgers and a mission to redefine the city’s burger game, this month-long residency promises to be a delicious adventure you won’t want to miss.Smash Guys is the latest creation from Nikhil and AB Gupta, the culinary masterminds behind The Pizza Bakery and Paris Panini. This time, their mission is bold: to celebrate the art of the burger by bringing the finest styles from across the globe under one roof.After months of meticulously crafting every bite since their smash hit debut at The Conservatory, they’re now ready to take things up a notch with an exciting month-long residency.Smash Guys is here to redefine Bengaluru’s burger scene, filling the flavor void with juicy patties, crisp buns, and creative combinations that promise to thrill every burger lover in town.The dream team behind Smash Guys: Chef Guru is the Chef Partner at The Pizza Bakery & Paris Panini. Graduated from Le Cordon Bleu, Australia, his expertise in balancing textures and creating unique sauce combinations brings an unexpected twist to classic burger elements. His commitment to sourcing premium ingredients ensures every component tells its own story while contributing to a harmonious whole.Chef Adithya Kidambi is our friendly neighborhood kombucha scientist. He has built mossant into the best craft kombucha brand in the city, but what few know about him is that he is a trained Chef and self-taught burger scholar who delivered burgers to people during the lockdown post which he sold out at several pop-ups in the city. Adi excels in styles like the Nashville Chicken, Smash Buff/Lamb classics, and Asian-inspired burgers using ingredients like kimchi and miso.Chef Suby is all about chasing the ULTIMATE BURGER DREAM. His obsession with achieving the perfect meat-to-fat ratio and that caramelised crust has led him to experiment with countless grinds and smashing techniques. Chef Rohil brings an elegant touch to the veg side of our menu. He completes our trio with his innovative approach to flavour building, and fine-tuning the perfect balance of flavour and texture.Beer on TapTo make this residency even better, The Conservatory will be serving up refreshing beer on tap throughout the month. With their expertly crafted burgers and a mission to redefine the city’s burger game, this month-long residency promises to be a delicious adventure you won’t want to miss.Smash Guys is the latest creation from Nikhil and AB Gupta, the culinary masterminds behind The Pizza Bakery and Paris Panini. description: Smash Guys Burger Residency with BeerThe Smash Guys Burger Residency with Beer marks a thrilling new chapter for The Conservatory, a space that has become a hotspot for culinary innovation over the past two years. We've hosted some of the country’s most exciting chefs and restaurants, recently venturing into international collaborations that have elevated Bengaluru’s dining scene.Now, we’re taking it one step further by introducing a unique residency experience—and who better to kick it off than the Smash Guys? With their expertly crafted burgers and a mission to redefine the city’s burger game, this month-long residency promises to be a delicious adventure you won’t want to miss.Smash Guys is the latest creation from Nikhil and AB Gupta, the culinary masterminds behind The Pizza Bakery and Paris Panini. This time, their mission is bold: to celebrate the art of the burger by bringing the finest styles from across the globe under one roof.After months of meticulously crafting every bite since their smash hit debut at The Conservatory, they’re now ready to take things up a notch with an exciting month-long residency.Smash Guys is here to redefine Bengaluru’s burger scene, filling the flavor void with juicy patties, crisp buns, and creative combinations that promise to thrill every burger lover in town.The dream team behind Smash Guys: Chef Guru is the Chef Partner at The Pizza Bakery & Paris Panini. Graduated from Le Cordon Bleu, Australia, his expertise in balancing textures and creating unique sauce combinations brings an unexpected twist to classic burger elements. His commitment to sourcing premium ingredients ensures every component tells its own story while contributing to a harmonious whole.Chef Adithya Kidambi is our friendly neighborhood kombucha scientist. He has built mossant into the best craft kombucha brand in the city, but what few know about him is that he is a trained Chef and self-taught burger scholar who delivered burgers to people during the lockdown post which he sold out at several pop-ups in the city. Adi excels in styles like the Nashville Chicken, Smash Buff/Lamb classics, and Asian-inspired burgers using ingredients like kimchi and miso.Chef Suby is all about chasing the ULTIMATE BURGER DREAM. His obsession with achieving the perfect meat-to-fat ratio and that caramelised crust has led him to experiment with countless grinds and smashing techniques. Chef Rohil brings an elegant touch to the veg side of our menu. He completes our trio with his innovative approach to flavour building, and fine-tuning the perfect balance of flavour and texture.Beer on TapTo make this residency even better, The Conservatory will be serving up refreshing beer on tap throughout the month. name: Smash Guys Burger Residency with Beer
description: Smash Guys Burger Residency with BeerThe Smash Guys Burger Residency with Beer marks a thrilling new chapter for The Conservatory, a space that has become a hotspot for culinary innovation over the past two years. We've hosted some of the country’s most exciting chefs and restaurants, recently venturing into international collaborations that have elevated Bengaluru’s dining scene.Now, we’re taking it one step further by introducing a unique residency experience—and who better to kick it off than the Smash Guys? With their expertly crafted burgers and a mission to redefine the city’s burger game, this month-long residency promises to be a delicious adventure you won’t want to miss.Smash Guys is the latest creation from Nikhil and AB Gupta, the culinary masterminds behind The Pizza Bakery and Paris Panini. This time, their mission is bold: to celebrate the art of the burger by bringing the finest styles from across the globe under one roof.After months of meticulously crafting every bite since their smash hit debut at The Conservatory, they’re now ready to take things up a notch with an exciting month-long residency.Smash Guys is here to redefine Bengaluru’s burger scene, filling the flavor void with juicy patties, crisp buns, and creative combinations that promise to thrill every burger lover in town.The dream team behind Smash Guys: Chef Guru is the Chef Partner at The Pizza Bakery & Paris Panini. Graduated from Le Cordon Bleu, Australia, his expertise in balancing textures and creating unique sauce combinations brings an unexpected twist to classic burger elements. His commitment to sourcing premium ingredients ensures every component tells its own story while contributing to a harmonious whole.Chef Adithya Kidambi is our friendly neighborhood kombucha scientist. He has built mossant into the best craft kombucha brand in the city, but what few know about him is that he is a trained Chef and self-taught burger scholar who delivered burgers to people during the lockdown post which he sold out at several pop-ups in the city. Adi excels in styles like the Nashville Chicken, Smash Buff/Lamb classics, and Asian-inspired burgers using ingredients like kimchi and miso.Chef Suby is all about chasing the ULTIMATE BURGER DREAM. His obsession with achieving the perfect meat-to-fat ratio and that caramelised crust has led him to experiment with countless grinds and smashing techniques. Chef Rohil brings an elegant touch to the veg side of our menu. He completes our trio with his innovative approach to flavour building, and fine-tuning the perfect balance of flavour and texture.Beer on TapTo make this residency even better, The Conservatory will be serving up refreshing beer on tap throughout the month. Pair your favorite Smash Guys burger with a perfectly chilled pint, and let the ultimate burger-and-beer experience begin!The Burger MenuNon- Vegetarian MenuBUFFALO FRIED CHICKEN (Rs. 585)Buffalo sauce-dunked fried chicken, grilled onions, blue cheese sauce, lettuceCRISPY CHICKEN DIPPER (Rs.585)French dip dunked fried chicken, white onions, pickles, garlic aioli, and lettuce. name: OTJF + Pink Section Present: Heavy Rotation
description: Join us at Indiranagar Social on Saturday, December 21, from 8 PM onwards for Heavy Rotation, featuring DJs Poly-Ritmo, Nich, and Mad Neighbor, presented by On The Jungle Floor and Pink Section.Introducing Heavy Rotation—where rare grooves from around the world find you. These are sounds you didn’t know you needed—from Turkish psychedelia to Ethio Jazz, Afrobeat to Brazilian funk, and everything in between.We’re creating Heavy Rotation not just to spotlight fantastic selectors and DJs from around the globe, but to dig deep into all the incredible music they’ve been hiding in their stacks. The kind you keep going back to long after the night is gone.For our debut gig, we’re thrilled to host Poly-Ritmo, a London-based DJ and musician known for her genre-spanning sets that weave percussive rhythms into an irresistible dancefloor experience. She’s graced legendary stages like Glastonbury, Gala, We Out Here, and Shambala, and joining her are Nich, blending infectious grooves with global sounds, and Mad Neighbor, spinning a dynamic mix of Afrobeat, Islamic Funk and much more.Join us on 21st December at Indiranagar Social for the start of something special!

name: A window into Kalaripayatt - Robin Philip
description: Step Into the World of Kalaripayatt with Urban KalariExperience the ancient wisdom of Kalaripayattu through a modern lens in this 2-day beginner-friendly workshop, A Window into Kalaripayatt. Guided by Robin Philip—an expert with over a decade of training under esteemed Gurukkals—this program breaks down the essence of this martial art into a relatable, accessible format.Workshop Highlights:Foundational Movements: Master basic stances, leg raises, jumps, and sequences.Self-Defense Reflexes: Learn six essential blocks to build muscle memory and confidence.Precision and Form: Avoid common errors and engage correctly for maximum impact.Flow and Connection: Practice two full-body flows for a seamless integration of movement.Kalari Philosophy: Discover the principles of Kalaripayattu and Kalari Chikilsa for a deeper mind-body connection.Who Should Join?This workshop is perfect for anyone curious about Kalari, seeking a holistic workout, exploring animal-inspired movement, or looking for practical self-defense skills. Whether you’re reconnecting with movement or starting fresh, this is your gateway to the profound art of Kalaripayattu.Rediscover the balance of strength, agility, and mindfulness. Join us and take the first step into this transformative journey!

name: An Evening of Sitar Jugalbandi | Courtyard Baithak
description: An Evening of Sitar Jugalbandi with Ustad Rafique Khan & Ustad Shafique Khan About Courtyard BaithakThe Courtyard Baithak series is curated by tabla wizard and prodigy Trilochan Kampli, who with his uncompromising standards in music, evokes the best from every artist that he invites to perform. We are bringing musicians and audiences together on a sublime musical journey.Exclusive gatherings, quiet strains of exquisite music, and dedicated artists across selected genres - The Courtyard Baithak series promises a true classical musical experience.Please note: The ticket includes performance onlyWhat is jugalbandi?A musical duet where two artists come together to create an electrifying conversation through their instruments. It’s not just a performance—it's a playful exchange of melodies and rhythms, blending harmony with friendly competition. Each artist builds on the other's phrases, creating a dynamic, spontaneous, and unforgettable experience for the audience.About the ArtistsUstad Rafique Khan and Shafique Khan are twin sitar maestros. Hailing from a legendary musical family spanning seven generations, these brothers bring their shared heritage to life on stage. Together, their sitar jugalbandis are a seamless conversation between tradition and innovation, promising an unforgettable musical evening.Ustad Rafique Khan With a lineage spanning seven generations, Ustad Rafique Khan is celebrated for preserving the purity of raagas while seamlessly blending the lyrical Gayaki Ang (mimicking vocal nuances) with the intricate Tantrakari Ang (focused on rhythm and speed). A top-grade All India Radio artist, Rafique Khan has captivated audiences worldwide, collaborating with legends like Pt. Vishwa Mohan Bhatt and Pt. Ronu Majumdar.Shafique Khan Shafique Khan carries the family’s illustrious legacy with a unique style that highlights meditative Alap and stunning Gamak Tans. His mastery of Gayaki Ang and Tantrakari Ang creates a perfect balance of melody and rhythm. Recognized with prestigious awards like the "Surmani" and Bharat Ratna Pt. Bhimasen Joshi National Award, Shafique has earned acclaim on global stages, including Germany and the U.S.Together, these twin maestros will take you on a musical journey that bridges tradition and innovation, showcasing the timeless beauty of the sitar. Don’t miss this extraordinary evening of harmony and heritage!This event is supported by Samagata Foundation. name: Christmas Eve walk.
description: This is a special festive season walk in Fraser town & surrounding areas to mark Christmas. This walk is a unique blend of heritage and food to celebrate X'mas. On this walk we visit some of the heritage churches in this area & take a look at the cribs and decorations put up for X'mas. In between the visits we have Included sampling of some special Christmas delicacies like marzipans plum cakes kalkals etc. Not to forget to about listening to the Carols [If happening] on the way.So what are you waiting for grab your woolen clothes a Santa cap & join us in the celebrations.

location.address: St Johns Church Rd, Cleveland Town, Frazer Town, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560005, India
